code: import i18n from"i18next";import{initReactI18next}from"react-i18next";import LanguageDetector from"i18next-browser-languagedetector";import en from"./locales/en.json";import tr from"./locales/tr.json";import ar from"./locales/ar.json";i18n.use(LanguageDetector).use(initReactI18next).init({resources:{en:{translation:en},tr:{translation:tr},ar:{translation:ar}},fallbackLng:"en",interpolation:{escapeValue:false}});export default i18n;
